phrs.translation: 胡说, 胡言, 表演者
纽约梅隆银行资产管理公司宣布收购尚高资本

sentences.sentence: We suspect that there will be all sorts of self-justifying guff from them.
sentences.translation: 我们怀疑他们会带来各种各样的自我辩解。

sentences.sentence: "Now she doesn't take guff from anyone," says Mark with a smile. "it's pretty cool."
sentences.translation: “现在她根本不需要别人帮她，”马克打趣着说，“还挺酷的呢。”
